system.requirements: Ork, Berserk Charge, Furious Assault, Weapon Skill 40
system.effect: If Ork succesfully hits their Target with a Charge Action, they can spend their reaction to make an additional attack using the same Bonuses or Penalties as the original attack.

description.value: If Ork succesfully hits their Target with a Charge Action, they can spend their reaction to make an additional attack using the same Bonuses or Penalties as the original attack.
